20101223013644.000|20101223013645.000|CC1|>> Susie: LIKE MANY OF US,

20101223013700.000|20101223013703.000|CC1|WITH A SPURT OF LAST-MINUTE     
20101223013703.000|20101223013705.000|CC1|PRODUCTIVITY.                   
20101223013705.000|20101223013706.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HOW IS CONGRESS    
20101223013706.000|20101223013707.000|CC1|LIKE A COLLEGE STUDENT?         
20101223013707.000|20101223013708.000|CC1|IT LEFT A LOT TO THE LAST       
20101223013708.000|20101223013709.000|CC1|MINUTE, AND IS NOW WORKING      
20101223013709.000|20101223013712.000|CC1|AROUND THE CLOCK TO CATCH UP.   
20101223013712.000|20101223013712.000|CC1|AND THAT JOKE, SAYS ECONOMICS   
20101223013712.000|20101223013714.000|CC1|PROFESSOR DONALD MARRON, HAS    
20101223013714.000|20101223013716.000|CC1|CONSEQUENCES.                   
20101223013716.000|20101223013717.000|CC1|>> THE NUMBER ONE FEATURE OF OUR
20101223013717.000|20101223013717.000|CC1|TAX CODE NOW IS THAT EVERY      
20101223013717.000|20101223013718.000|CC1|SIGNIFICANT PORTION OF THE TAX  
20101223013718.000|20101223013720.000|CC1|CODE HAS A BIG TEMPORARY TAX CUT
20101223013720.000|20101223013722.000|CC1|IN IT.                          
20101223013722.000|20101223013723.000|CC1|INDIVIDUAL INCOME TAXES,        
20101223013723.000|20101223013724.000|CC1|CORPORATE INCOME TAXES, PAYROLL 
20101223013724.000|20101223013725.000|CC1|TAXES AND THE ESTATE TAX.       
20101223013725.000|20101223013727.000|CC1|ALL OF THOSE HAVE SOME          
20101223013727.000|20101223013728.000|CC1|SIGNIFICANT FEATURE THAT EXPIRES
20101223013728.000|20101223013729.000|CC1|IN THE NEXT YEAR OR TWO.        
20101223013729.000|20101223013730.000|CC1|>> Reporter: TO BE SURE, ONE    
20101223013730.000|20101223013731.000|CC1|REASON THIS CONGRESS HAS PULLED 
20101223013731.000|20101223013732.000|CC1|SO MANY ALL-NIGHTERS IS THAT IT 
20101223013732.000|20101223013736.000|CC1|HAS BEEN VERY PRODUCTIVE.       
20101223013736.000|20101223013737.000|CC1|FROM BANKING REFORM TO THE START
20101223013737.000|20101223013738.000|CC1|ARMS CONTROL TREATY TO "DON'T

20101223015037.000|20101223015038.000|CC1|FINANCIAL FITNESS MEANS PAYING  
20101223015038.000|20101223015039.000|CC1|BILLS ON TIME, NOT OPENING NEW  
20101223015039.000|20101223015041.000|CC1|CREDIT CARDS TO JUGGLE DEBT, AND
20101223015041.000|20101223015042.000|CC1|NOT CLOSING DOWN EXISTING CARDS,

20101223015043.000|20101223015047.000|CC1|RATING.
